job_purpose: Driving awareness and understanding of artificial intelligence capabilities across Roy Hill, fostering an AI-savvy culture, upskilling employees, and ensuring departments leverage AI technologies for decision-making, operational efficiency, and innovation.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop and execute an organization-wide AI literacy program
Collaborate with departmental leaders to identify AI learning needs
Create engaging content and resources for AI knowledge and skills development
Establish an AI community of practice
Measure and report on the effectiveness of AI education programs
Provide ongoing support for sustainable AI adoption
Assess and optimize the utilization of existing AI tools and platforms
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Technology, Education, Business, Communication, or related field
Experience in leading or significantly contributing to AI or technology implementation projects
Familiarity with the mining industry or related sectors with AI applications
Professional experience in designing and delivering educational programs
Solid understanding of AI and machine learning concepts
Experience in managing projects related to AI initiatives and educational programs
company_details: Roy Hill is a world-class mining company in West Australia's Pilbara region, focusing on innovative, integrated mining rail and port operations. The company values people, supports team development, and is committed to new technologies for higher quality, efficiency, and safety. Roy Hill promotes cultural diversity, gender equality, and non-discrimination.
